description: OverviewVerkada’s Growth Data Science and Analytics team is looking for a talented leader to play an integral role in leveraging our data and technology to help our marketing team run better, faster, and smarter. You will have the opportunity to work directly with leadership to play a vital role in both creating and driving world-class insights that will drive the next phase of growth here at Verkada.As the Manager of the Marketing Analytics team, you'll lead the development of key metrics and insights essential for driving maximizing campaign ROI within the organization. A person in this role will spearhead the development of impactful solutions including revenue attribution, GTM data insights, and automated intent signals contributing directly to the success of our business.ResponsibilitiesWork with Verkada’s Executives and GTM Leaders to build robust attribution frameworks that meet the growing needs of our businessBuild out a small team of world-class data analysts to deliver cutting-edge insights that will drive incremental revenue for the marketing teamArchitect comprehensive A/B testing frameworks aimed at optimizing campaign performance and maximizing impactSpearhead innovation by conceptualizing and implementing KPIs pivotal in shaping business decisions, while establishing resilient data pipelines to sustain themEffectively communicate intricate concepts across all departments, securing buy-in and fostering trust in our systemsRequirementsBachelor’s or master’s degree in a technical discipline7+ years of experience in quantitative analysis and impeccable data analysis skillsStrong ability to solve ambiguous problems by proposing the best of multiple viable solutions.Proficiency in SQL and relational databases.Experience with data visualization and transformation tools (Looker, Airflow, DBT, etc).Track record of presenting KPIs and impenetrable data-driven recommendations through story to senior leadershipExcellent written and oral communication skills.Nice to HaveDirect relevant experience in a related field (Growth Analytics, Data Science, Product Analytics, etc)Experience building and architecting data pipelines.Familiarity with business systems: Salesforce, Marketo, Outreach, or similar.#J-18808-Ljbffr
